author: frangio_
content:
opened a PR with the proposal to change interaction of EXTCODE* with delegations

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8969

author: frangio_
content: there is an even more conservative option which is for those opcodes to observe the delegation designator prefix only, similar to EOF contracts. this may be in line with removing avenues for "introspection"
